title: How to Convert Yards to Feet

steps.headline: Determine the value in yards you want to convert to feet.
Plug in the value in yards into the variables in the formula listed below
Using a calculator or otherwise, perform the calculations.

text:
Determine the value in yards you want to convert to feet. Plug in the value in yards into the variables in the formula listed below ____ yd * 3 ft1 yd = ? ft Using a calculator or otherwise, perform the calculations. You'll get the end result which will be in feet. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/7\/71\/Convert-Yards-to-Feet-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Convert-Yards-to-Feet-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/7\/71\/Convert-Yards-to-Feet-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/aid3511709-v4-728px-Convert-Yards-to-Feet-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

sentences: Determine the value in yards you want to convert to feet.
Plug in the value in yards into the variables in the formula listed below  ____  yd     *    3 ft1 yd     =     ?
ft Using a calculator or otherwise, perform the calculations.
You'll get the end result which will be in feet.
